name: Fortune Lady Fire
effectText: This card's ATK/DEF become its Level x 200. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Increase this card's Level by 1 (max. 12). When this card is Special Summoned in Attack Position by the effect of a "Fortune Lady" card: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's ATK on the field.
